name: food-delivery-backend
description: A production-ready food delivery backend with microservices architecture

scripts.install:all: npm install && cd services/user-service && npm install && cd ../restaurant-service && npm install && cd ../delivery-service && npm install
scripts.build:all: cd services/user-service && npm run build && cd ../restaurant-service && npm run build && cd ../delivery-service && npm run build
scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev:user" "npm run dev:restaurant" "npm run dev:delivery"
scripts.start: concurrently "npm run start:user" "npm run start:restaurant" "npm run start:delivery"
scripts.test: npm run test:user && npm run test:restaurant && npm run test:delivery

author: Food Delivery Team
